Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.charactercards

Class CharacterCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.charactercards.CharacterCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
InfluenceCharacterCard, ProfessorsCharacterCard, ProhibitionCharacterCard, StepsCharacterCard, StudentMoverCharacterCard
public abstract class CharacterCard extends Object implements Serializable
The CharacterCard abstract class models the character cards of the game and their effects
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable()
      The method isAvailable establishes if the card can be activated
      Returns:
      whether the card can be activated

    • updateCost

      public void updateCost()
      The method increaseCost increases the cost of this CharacterCard by 1

    • effectInfluence

      public int[] effectInfluence(Player[] players, Player currPlayer, Island island, Clan clan)
      The method effectInfluence calculates an array that will be added to the array of influences of the basic rule that represents the effect that this CharacterCard has on the calculation of the influence on an Island
      Parameters:
      players - all the players of the game
      currPlayer - the current Player
      island - the Island on with the influences are being calculated
      clan - the Clan to remove from the calculation of the influence (if needed)
      Returns:
      an array of points to add to that calculated with the basic rule in order to take in account the effect on the influences of this CharacterCard

    • effectStepsMotherNature

      public int effectStepsMotherNature()
      The method effectStepsMotherNature calculates the number of additional steps on the movement of Mother Nature that this CharacterCard allows
      Returns:
      the number of additional steps that this CharacterCard allows

    • effectPlayerProfessor

      public Player effectPlayerProfessor(Player[] players, Player currPlayer, Clan clan)
      The method effectPlayerProfessor calculates the Player that has to own the professor of the Clan given by parameter accordingly with the effect on this of this CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      players - all the players of the game
      currPlayer - the player currently playing
      clan - the Clan of the professor to calculate its owner
      Returns:
      the Player that has to own the professor of the Clan clan, null in case of a tie

    • applyInitialEffect

      public boolean applyInitialEffect(Turn turn, Player[] players)
      The method applyInitialEffect applies the initial effect of this CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      turn - the current Turn
      players - all the Players of this game
      Returns:
      whether the effect was applied correctly

    • applyEffect

      public boolean applyEffect(Game game, Island island)
      The method applyEffect applies the effect of this CharacterCard on the Island with the specified index
      Parameters:
      game - the Game
      island - the Island on which the effect has to be applied
      Returns:
      whether the effect has been applied

    • applyEffect

      public boolean applyEffect(Game game, StudentContainer destination, Map<Clan,Integer> students1, Map<Clan,Integer> students2)
      The method applyEffect applies the effect of this CharacterCard with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      game - the Game
      destination - the destination of the students moved (if necessary)
      students1 - the students to move to the destination (if necessary)
      students2 - the students to move from the destination, in case of an exchange of students (if necessary)
      Returns:
      whether the effect has been applied

      public CharacterID getCharacterID()
